definition: everything is going smoothly/just as one wishes
to obey/to follow/to arrange/to make reasonable/along/favorable

sentences.english: John walked through his driving test.
sentences.chinese: 約翰順遂地經過了駕駛檢驗。

sentences.english: If everything seems to be go wrong, you have obviously overlooked something.
sentences.chinese: 若是事事乍看順遂，那顯然是由某個處所沒有注重到。

sentences.english: I earnestly hope to lead a healthy and prosperous life in the future.
sentences.chinese: 莪誠實地渴望將來能過着康健而順遂的一生。

sentences.english: Wishing you many future succe es.
And when everything is perfect, you escape such as thieves…
sentences.chinese: 諸事順遂之時，如賊首般逃之夭夭。

sentences.english: Bob:It's good to see you again, Beth. How was your trip?
sentences.chinese: 貝絲，很開心再見到你。飛行還順遂吧？

definition: propitious wind throughout the journey (idiom)/plain sailing/to go smoothly/have a nice trip!
to be successful in business/professional success
favorable weather (idiom); good weather for crops
to take it up a notch/to bring it up a level
to thwart/to foil (sb's plans)/a setback/a failure/a defeat
luck/fate/opportunity/the ups and downs of life
to care for/to show concern for/to think longingly (of one's country)
